name: Flowpoint Analytics Tracking Code
author: Flowpoint Analytics ltd

sections.description:
This WordPress plugin seamlessly integrates Flowpoint’s advanced tracking analytics into your WordPress site, empowering you with real-time insights into user behavior and interactions. By leveraging Flowpoint’s AI-driven analytics, you can enhance user experience and drive conversion rates.

Flowpoint generates website audits and recommendations designed to imporve website conversion rates using AI.

Important: This plugin requires an external service provided by Flowpoint for its functionality. Your website will connect to Flowpoint’s servers to send analytics data. This connection is essential for gathering analytics and providing the insights you need to improve your website.

Features

  • AI Generated Website Audit
  • AI Assistant For Website Analytics (Powered by ChatGPT)
  • Easy Installation and Setup
  • Real-time Analytics Tracking
  • Funnel Analytics
  • Behaviour Analytics
  • Installation Support
  • Live Customer Support

External Service

This plugin relies on Flowpoint Analytics as a third-party service. Here are the key details regarding this integration:

  • Service Provider: Flowpoint Analytics
  • Service Description: Provides advanced tracking analytics, offering insights into user behavior and interactions on your WordPress site.
  • Data Transmitted: User interactions like mouse clicks, scrolls, and page views are transmitted to Flowpoint for analysis.
  • Privacy Policy: Flowpoint Privacy Policy
  • Terms of Use: Flowpoint Terms of Service

Please review Flowpoint’s terms and privacy policy to ensure compliance with your website’s legal requirements.

Contact

For support and feature requests, please email us at support@flowpoint.ai.
sections.installation:
Automatic Installation

  1. Navigate to Plugins > Add New in your WordPress admin panel.
  2. Search for “Flowpoint Analytics Tracking Code” and click Install Now.
  3. After the plugin has been installed, click Activate.

Manual Installation

  1. Download the plugin ZIP file from the WordPress repository or GitHub.
  2. Go to Plugins > Add New in your WordPress admin panel and click Upload Plugin.
  3. Choose the downloaded ZIP file and click Install Now.
  4. After the plugin has been installed, click Activate.
sections.faq:
Is this plugin free?

Yes, this plugin is free to use. However, it requires an account with Flowpoint Analytics, which may have its own costs associated.

How do I uninstall the tracking code?

Go to the plugin’s settings page and click on the Uninstall button. This will remove the Flowpoint tracking code from your site.
